txt.en: I am in need of some plants for a concoction. It will be a potent weapon against the Orcs.
Enârshan has asked you to gather Sigêma and Bizgâr as well as defeat Orcs near the Falls of Ilûritu.
Defeated Orcs near the Falls of Ilûritu ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Enârshan with the gathered ingredients in the Falls of Ilûritu.

'Ah yes, these will do nicely.'

Enârshan takes the plants from you.

'And I trust that you disposed of any Orcs you saw tainting my waters? Good. We will drive them from these lands.

'I will finish the concoction shortly. Return to me when you are ready to travel back into Khûn Sagaz.'
Return to Enârshan in the Falls of Ilûritu
Enârshan has asked that you gather Sigêma and Bizgâr plants as well as defeat any Orcs near the Falls of Ilûritu.

'I am in need of some plants for a concoction. It will be a potent weapon against the Orcs.

'Along the river flowing from these falls you will find flowers known as Sigêma, and Bizgâr, a weed. Gather any many as you can for me while I craft the rest.

'The river's edge has been tainted by the presence of Orcs as well. So dispose of any that you see.'
Return to Enârshan in the Falls of Ilûritu
Defeat Orcs near the Falls of Ilûritu ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
